title: It Is Fall
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: In It Is Fall, students learn about some of the things seen and used during the fall season. Supportive illustrations and use of the high-frequency word the support beginning readers.
reviewWords: acorn, apple, corn, jacket, leaf, moon, pumpkin, rake
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant sound /f/
grammar: Nouns                : Identify nouns as naming words
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and write the high-frequency word the
